movie.title: Pride & Prejudice
movie.actors: Keira Knightley, Talulah Riley, Rosamund Pike, Jena Malone
movie.plot: The story is based on Jane Austen's novel about five sisters - Jane, Elizabeth, Mary, Kitty and Lydia Bennet - in Georgian England. Their lives are turned upside down when a wealthy young man (Mr. Bingley) and his best friend (Mr. Darcy) arrive in their neighborhood.
movie.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 18 wins & 41 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Sure, it's another adaptation of cinema's fave Jane Austen novel, but key performances and a modern filmmaking sensibility make this familiar period piece fresh and enjoyable.
